com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities
Class Group_NewIssue

java.lang.Object
  ActivityGroup
      com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities.Group_NewIssue

public class Group_NewIssue
extends ActivityGroup

This is a group of two activities: NewIssueA for textual and image info; and NewIssueB for location information.

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis, Dr. Post-doctoral Researcher, Information Technologies Institute, ITI-CERTH, Thermi, Thessaloniki, Greece ververid@iti.gr, http://mklab.iti.gr
